name: HELI DYNAMIC PTY LTD
about: At HELI DYNAMIC PTY LTD, we are dedicated to providing top-notch helicopter flight training programs tailored to meet the diverse needs of aspiring and experienced pilots. Our expert instructors, with extensive industry experience, ensure a safe, high-quality, and consistent training environment. We offer comprehensive courses for both private and commercial helicopter licences, as well as advanced ratings and endorsements. Our modern and well-maintained fleet includes a variety of helicopters, such as the Cabri G2 and Robinson R44, to provide students with valuable industry experience. Located in a unique and challenging training environment, our students gain practical skills in real-world scenarios, preparing them for successful careers in the helicopter industry. With a strong focus on standards and safety, we aim to produce proficient and professional helicopter pilots. Join us to embark on a rewarding journey to become a skilled helicopter pilot.
services:
["Helicopter Training Introduction
Trial Introductory Flights
Private Helicopter License
Commercial Helicopter License
Helicopter Theory Lessons
Helicopter Flight Reviews
Helicopter Low Level Rating
Helicopter Flight Tests
Helicopter Sling & Longline Training
Aerial Application Fire Rating
Helicopter Bambi Bucket Training
Helicopter Winch Training
Helicopter Differences Training and Testing
Flight Instructor Rating Training
Helicopter Mustering Rating & Testing
Night VFR Rating Training"]
